- Committed to Crown Court for sentence in custody Committed for sentence (Section 14 of the Sentencing Act 2020). Remanded in custody until hearing on a Date and time to be fixed, ADDRESS_LINE_3 Crown Court. Basis: Remand after conviction for the purpose of enabling inquiries to be made or of determining the most suitable method of determining the case. Bail exceptions: Likely to offend. Reason for applying: Nature and seriousness of offence, Previous record and character, Serving prisoner.. Bail remand days to count (tagged days): 0.
